forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 61, with temperatures falling to around 59 in the afternoon. West wind around 24 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 52. West wind 17 to 23 mph, with gusts as high as 29 mph.

weather_report:
In the heart of Downtown San Francisco, the afternoon unfolds with a vibrant clarity, the sun pouring its golden light across the iconic cityscape. A fresh, invigorating breeze from the west carries whispers of adventure, while temperatures hover in the cool embrace of the low sixties. The skyline sparkles under the brilliant canopy of blue, unfurling an invitation for those who wander the streets. Though the west wind gusts energetically, around 24 mph, transforming the air into a refreshing companion, the city remains largely free from the shroud of fog, with only the faintest hints of the marine layer tracing the edges of the bay.

As twilight approaches, the promise of a partly cloudy night lingers, beckoning a drop in temperature to the serene low fifties. It is a perfect moment to layer up—envision a light jacket and perhaps a cozy scarf to ward off the chill that often creeps in after sunset. The brisk wind may accompany any evening stroll, so feel free to explore the vibrant neighborhoods, perhaps wandering over to a cozy café or an outdoor gathering, sipping warm beverages while soaking in the ambiance of a city alive with possibility.
